primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God initiates a cosmic war against the powers of Sin and Death to reclaim His creation and establish His ultimate purpose.

tekstueel_bewijs: God chose what is weak in the world to shame the strong
He comes at the end of the ages to do away with Sin, Death, and the devil

object.identificatie: The reclamation of creation and the victory of the Lamb
tekstueel_bewijs: the glory that is to be revealed

zender.identificatie: God the Father / The Alpha and Omega
tekstueel_bewijs: the God who approaches us from the future
the God who raises the dead

ontvanger.identificatie: The Church / The World / The Saints
tekstueel_bewijs: the one who endures to the end will be saved
to draw us all into himself
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer identifies as the Receiver of God's victory and a participant in His resistance.

helper.identificatie: The Spirit / The Blood of the Lamb / The Word of Testimony
tekstueel_bewijs: conquered by the blood of the Lamb
helper.rol_van_god: God is the Subject; Christ is the Mediator/Helper through His blood.

tegenstander.identificatie: The Beast / Sin / Death / The Devil / The Flesh
tekstueel_bewijs: the law of Sin and Death
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not merely human behavior but ontological and cosmic powers that require divine intervention to defeat.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The Church (S) resists the works of darkness (O) through endurance and witness.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Church / The Saints
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The Church's action is a participation in God's already-initiated war; it is the 'vanguard' of His future.

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.helper_subject_tegenstander: The Spirit/Blood of Lamb → God/Christ → Sin/Death/Devil
actantieel_schema_visualisatie.subject_naar_object: God → The Restoration of All Things

voorbeelden_god_subject: God chose what is low and despised
He comes at the end of the ages
voorbeelden_mens_subject: We wait for it with patience
The church wears the armor of light
We show forth the Lord’s death

voorbeelden: The creation waits with eager longing
I don’t pretend to have any grasp of the details
the power of the One Who Comes
the God who raises the dead

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on the divine 'Power' (Pouvoir) that overcomes human 'Incompetence' (the weakling). Grace is the endowment of power to endure.

primaire_tegenstelling.s1: Life in the Spirit / The Day
primaire_tegenstelling.s2: The Law of Sin and Death / The Night

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: Moves from the contradiction of S2 (the mockery of the UN) to the S1 (the sound of the trumpet).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension is resolved eschatologically: God's future invades the present.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Extremely high; Sin and Death are treated as objective, lethal powers.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon is profoundly theocentric. God is the primary actor in the cosmic drama, and human action is framed as a responsive 'vanguard' participation rather than the cause of salvation.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: David Johnson struggling to love... Reg Carpenter hanging on

indicatoren_genade.indicator: God as Subject of active verbs
indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: God chose what is weak... to bring to nothing things that are
principalities... powers... world rulers of this present darkness

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Contemporary parishioners are used as examples, but they are framed as 'wearing the armor of light' (a gift) rather than achieving victory by their own strength.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: The sermon already provides this by noting Abraham's hope was 'divine hope' placed in God.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief and empowerment; the burden of the war is on God, though the hearer is called to the front lines.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The primary program (God's war) perfectly contains and gives meaning to the secondary program (the Church's endurance).
spanning_punten: The 'already' of the Lamb's victory vs the 'not yet' of the 'last enemy' (Death).

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: warfare of the victorious Lamb... to do away with Sin, Death, and the devil

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit provides the 'Pouvoir-faire' (ability) to endure what is humanly impossible.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Critical; Sin is a 'sphere' or 'law' that enslaves, not just a mistake.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The narrative engine is driven by God's apocalyptic intervention. The Subject is God, the Object is the New Creation, and the Church is the Receiver/Vanguard.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain as is; this is a classic 'Grace' distribution.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: Opponent is already cosmic and overwhelming.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This sermon is a masterclass in theocentric preaching. It avoids moralism by making God the Subject of the cosmic battle and framing human faithfulness as a gift of the Spirit.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: A rhetorical analysis might focus on the 'war' metaphors; Greimas shows that these metaphors function to shift agency from the hearer to God.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains Joel 3; semiotics explains how Joel 3 functions as a 'Sender' of values for the modern church.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas reveals that the 'weakling' saying 'I am a warrior' is a modal transformation where God provides the 'Pouvoir' that the Subject lacks.

volledige_subject_lijst: The Spirit has set me free
appendices.notities: The sermon follows Fleming Rutledge's grammar of grace perfectly.
